title: Generate EOS Keypair
instruction.title: Instructions:
instruction.step1: 1. Save the Private Key in a safe environment, such as writing it down on paper. A screenshot is NOT safe.
instruction.step2: 2. Double-check the Private Key you have savedâ€”it is impossible to restore if lost.
instruction.step3: 3. Copy the Public Key and return to the previous page.
instruction.step4: 4. Paste and send it to complete the process of claiming your account.
use.alert.title: Are you sure you want to use this key pair?
use.alert.content: Before using it, make sure you have saved the Private Key. Clicking Confirm will automatically copy the Public Key to the clipboard.
regenerate.alert.title: Are you absolutely sure?
regenerate.alert.content: Generate a new key pair will overwrite the current key pair. Are you sure you want to proceed?
